tool_description: Returns earnings dates, ex-dividend dates and determine if one event will happen before a specific date
name: Stock Earnings and Dividend Events
title: Stock Earnings and Dividend Events

api_list.name: hasEvents
api_list.description: Returns whether the company has one of earnings or ex-dividend event between current date and a specific date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-earnings-and-dividend-events.p.rapidapi.com/hasEvents/AAPL/230831"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-earnings-and-dividend-events.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-earnings-and-dividend-events.p.rapidapi.com/hasEvents/{ticker}/{beforedate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-earnings-and-dividend-events.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getEarningsDate
api_list.description: Returns the next earnings date along with a status indicating if the date is estimated or final
